Different Crime.Crime Name: Criminal Inadmissibility under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
procedural_fairness: disclosing evidence necessary for meaningful participation
evidence_assessment: CTV report deemed known or accessible

procedural_fairness: Procedural fairness requires disclosure of evidence if it affects meaningful participation in decision-making.
judicial_review_result: Application for judicial review dismissed; no breach of procedural fairness.
decision_outcome: Adewole's H&C application was refused based on new evidence.
reasoning_given: Adewole was aware of the CTV report and consented to communication between CIC and the hospital. His lawyer failed to respond to CIC's request for updates, and Adewole had a duty to disclose relevant information.

decision_reasoning: had opportunity to respond but chose not to
result_of_case: no breach of procedural fairness found
cause_of_action: refusal of H&C application due to criminal convictions and lack of updated information
procedure_followed: Federal Court reviewed under correctness standard

decision_reasoning: violation of applicants' right to respond
use of novel or significant evidence
judicial_review: focus on relevance of extrinsic evidence

decision_reasoning: elevated standard beyond actual best interests evaluation
application_details: refusal of H&C application for permanent residence
procedure_followed: judicial review before the Federal Court
decision_made: remitted for reconsideration to a different Officer

state_protection: no complete breakdown of state protection
decision_reasoning: Board's decision was reasonable and upheld
cause_of_action: fled Mexico due to alleged threats, seeking refugee status in Canada
procedure_followed: Federal Court reviewed the Board's decision under the reasonableness standard

best_interests_of_children: officer incorrectly applied a hardship threshold
decision_outcome: case remitted for reconsideration by a different officer
humanitarian_and_compassionate_factors: improper assessment of children's best interests
legal_basis: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act, s. 25(1)
